# aqli-epic Info

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Goals of aqli-epic:

* Bridge the gap between the epidemiology and the AQLI world.
* Work towards highlighting the gaps in the current research and use that to encourage the research community to cohesively work towards identifying ways that will help us fill those gaps.
